resources:
Menu Project //menu Help Settings /buttons SMS Phone Web Map Share New Act //textView Hello Kevin Song! =Help=

 SMS: Prepares a text message for phone number 1234567890

 Phone: Prepares to dial phone number 1234567890

 Web: Opens the Github main page in web browser of choice

 Map: Locates the Odaiba Gundam statue in map viewer of choice

 Share: Prepares an email message and opens App chooser

 New Act: Opens a new activity with a message
